              javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        Main Constructor
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to login to the API as.
        password - The password of the user to login to the API as.
        organization - The vCloud Organization the user belongs to.
        vCloudURL - The URL of the vCloud Director server.
